thread.title: Candidates for Charleston City Council, District 11
thread.title_full: Candidates for Charleston City Council, District 11 - Post and Courier

author: postandcourier.com
title: Candidates for Charleston City Council, District 11
text:
Chris Cannon Chris Cannon Age: 63
Residence: Westwood
Occupation: Owner and operator of Mister Charleston Tourist Services
Education: Bachelor’s degree in government and public administration, University of South Carolina
Political experience: None
Contact information: (843) 343-5113, ChrisCannonVoteCharleston@gmail.com , www.ChrisCannonVoteCharlestonCityCouncil.com
How I spend my spare time: Outdoors, hunting, fishing, golf
What makes me qualified for this office: More than 30 years working in the city of Charleston; Johns Island Council chairman since 2003; Charleston County Republican Party Executive Committee, 1994-2013 and first vice chairman 2000 to 2006.
If elected, my top priority would be: Control annexation and expansion by the city and concentrate on improving the current city area.
Bill Moody Age: 71
Residence: Harrison Acres, West Ashley
Occupation: CPA
Education: Bachelor’s degree in business administration, The Citadel
Political experience: Charleston City Council member since 2011
Contact information: (843) 364-5292, moodyw@comcast.net , www.votemoody.com
How I spend my spare time: Grandchildren and traveling with wife
What makes me qualified for this office: I was in charge of governmental auditing with our firm and have vast experience in that field. I am very familiar with the budgeting process.
If elected, my top priority would be: To protect the Charleston brand, the reawakening of West Ashley by providing the leadership for private sector investments, deployment of city resources for infrastructure and complete Interstate 526
